hero.title: Wolfie.app
hero.description: Your new favorite app for managing your pets.

features.title: Manage your pets with ease
features.description: Wolfie.app is the best way to manage your pets. It's simple, easy to use, and free.

items.name: Weight tracker
items.description: Track your pet's weight over time and get insights on their health.

items.name: Health log
items.description: Keep track of your pet's health history and get reminders for upcoming appointments.

items.name: Vets
items.description: Keep a list of your pet's vets and get directions to their offices.

pricing.title: Pricing plans will be available soon.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you. Send us an email or connect with us on LinkedIn.
